title: The Irish Hudibras, or, Fingallian prince taken from the sixth book of Virgil's Ã†neids, and adapted to the present times.
author: Farewell, James.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,
notes: Ascribed to James Farewell, which name O'Donoghue treats as the pseudonym of Walter Jones. This author was not born, however, until ca. 1698. Cf. Halkett & Laing; O'Donoghue's Poets of Ireland.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
